description: Books with suspense, mystery, or thriller plots.
Books with fictional narratives that explore human nature and relationships.
Books set in fictional worlds with magical elements.
Books based on factual information, including biographies and self-help.
Books considered to be timeless literary works.
Fictional books set in a historical context.
Books exploring futuristic, imagined universes with oppressive societal control.
Books related to computer science, programming, and technology.
Books exploring fundamental questions about existence, knowledge, values, reason, mind, and ethics.
Books of poetry or epic poems from classical literature.
